select ebpm.EBPL_ID, ebpm.EBPL_PARENT_PM_CODE, ebpm.EBPL_TYPE, ebpm.EBPL_CODE, ebpm.EBPL_QUICK_CODE, ebpm.EBPL_NAME_CN, ebpm.EBPL_NAME_EN, ebpm.EBPL_POST_CODE, ebpm.EBPL_IS_ABLE, ebpm.EBPL_STATION_CODE, ebpm.EBPL_STATION_NAME, ebpm.MODIFY_TIME, eb_province.EBPL_CODE PROVINCE_CODE, eb_province.EBPL_NAME_CN PROVINCE_NAME_CN, eb_province.EBPL_NAME_EN PROVINCE_NAME_EN from EB_PLACE eb_province left join EB_PLACE ebpm on ebpm.ebpl_type='PLACE_CITY' /* and ebpm.ebpl_is_able='ENABLE' */ and eb_province.EBPL_CODE=ebpm.EBPL_PARENT_PM_CODE
where eb_province.ebpl_type='PLACE_PROVINCE' /* and eb_province.ebpl_is_able='ENABLE' */ <<and eb_province.ebpl_code LIKE :provinceCode>> and ebpm.EBPL_CODE is not null /* and ebpm.EBPL_IS_ABLE='ENABLE' */ <if is_empty(ebplCode,ebplNameCn,ebplNameEn) == false > and (1=2 <<or ebpm.ebpl_code like '%' || :ebplCode || '%' >> <<or ebpm.EBPL_NAME_CN like '%' || :ebplNameCn || '%' >> <<or ebpm.EBPL_NAME_EN like '%' || :ebplNameEn || '%' >> ) </if>
